DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of gemcabene on the pharmacokinetics of atorvastatin 80 mg
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Gemcabene on the Pharmacokinetics of Atorvastatin in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males and Females 18‐65 years of age Good health as determined by medical history, physical examination, vital signs, ECG, and clinical laboratory measurements; Body weight 45 kg or greater, with a body mass index (BMI) ≤ 35 kg/m² (weight [kg]/height[meters]²) If female, of childbearing potential or lactation History of significant adverse reaction to any lipid‐lowering agent
